attributes.action: Sack those in Haringey Council whose actions led to the death of Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, are signing this petition to request that the officials from Haringey Council who were involved in the Baby P case be sacked and never allowed to work with children or within children's services again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
